title: Through scrummage, three-quarters and all
creator_credit: New Zealand National Film Unit, Geoffrey Scott, Oxley Hughan and John Cooper
brief_description: Rugby Union Football in New Zealand. Shows the popularity of the game with scenes from All Blacks tests and school and local clubs in action.
